mapper.select: SELECT t.createuserid AS userid, CASE WHEN t.zancount IS NULL OR t.zancount = '' THEN 0 WHEN t.zancount IS NOT NULL THEN t.zancount END AS zan, CASE WHEN f.fans IS NULL OR f.fans = '' THEN 0 WHEN f.fans IS NOT NULL THEN f.fans END AS fans, CASE WHEN g.guan IS NULL OR g.guan = '' THEN 0 WHEN g.guan IS NOT NULL THEN g.guan END AS follow, CASE WHEN c.collections IS NULL OR c.collections = '' THEN 0 WHEN c.collections IS NOT NULL THEN c.collections END AS collections, CASE WHEN t.releases IS NULL OR t.releases = '' THEN 0 WHEN t.releases IS NOT NULL THEN t.releases END AS releases, CASE WHEN ad.myAdoption IS NULL OR ad.myAdoption = '' THEN 0 WHEN ad.myAdoption IS NOT NULL THEN ad.myAdoption END AS myAdoption, CASE WHEN adop.AdoptionRequest IS NULL OR adop.AdoptionRequest = '' THEN 0 WHEN adop.AdoptionRequest IS NOT NULL THEN adop.AdoptionRequest END AS AdoptionRequest, CASE WHEN lycg.adoptionPerson IS NULL OR lycg.adoptionPerson = '' THEN 0 WHEN lycg.adoptionPerson IS NOT NULL THEN lycg.adoptionPerson END AS adoptionPerson FROM ( SELECT createuserid, sum(zan) AS zancount, count(1) AS releases FROM news WHERE createuserid = #{userId} AND isdel = 0 ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT uf.userid2, COUNT(1) AS fans FROM userfans uf WHERE uf.userid2 = #{userId} AND isdel = 0 ) f ON t.createuserid = f.userid2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT uf.userid1, COUNT(1) AS guan FROM userfans uf WHERE uf.userid1 = #{userId} AND isdel = 0 ) g ON t.createuserid = g.userid1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT nc.userid, count(1) AS collections FROM newscollections nc LEFT JOIN news ss ON ss.id = nc.newid WHERE nc.userid = #{userId} AND nc.isdel = 0 AND ss.isdel = 0 ) c ON c.userid = t.createuserid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT adr.userid, count(1) AS myAdoption FROM adoptionrequest adr WHERE adr.userid = #{userId} AND adr.isdel = 0 ) ad ON ad.userid = t.createuserid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT nuid.createuserid, count(1) AdoptionRequest FROM ( SELECT ne.createuserid, ne.id FROM news ne LEFT JOIN adoption ap ON ap.adoptionid = ne.id WHERE ne.createuserid = #{userId} AND ne.isadoptionnews = 1 AND ne.isdel = 0 AND ap.isadoption = 0 ) nuid LEFT JOIN adoptionrequest adr on adr.newsid = nuid.id WHERE adr.userid !='' and adr.isdel = 0 ) adop on adop.createuserid = t.createuserid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(1) AS adoptionPerson, n.createuserid FROM adoption ad LEFT JOIN news n ON ad.adoptionid = n.id WHERE n.createuserid = #{userId} AND ad.isadoption = 1 ) lycg on lycg.createuserid = t.createuserid
